meanings.definition: The direct opposite of something or someone.
meanings.sent1: In her mind, happiness and sadness were like antipodes.
meanings.sent2: Australia and the United States are considered antipodes.
meanings.sent3: Their taste in music was the antipodes of each other.
meanings.sent4: His calm demeanor was the antipodes of her frantic energy.
meanings.sent5: The twins' personalities were complete antipodes of each other.

meanings.definition: Any two places or regions on opposite sides of the earth.
meanings.sent1: China and Argentina are antipodes on the globe.
meanings.sent2: The North Pole and the South Pole are antipodes.
meanings.sent3: Meeting someone from your antipodes can be a rare experience.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship bridged the antipodes between their cultures.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the antipodes of the world is a dream for many adventurers.
